text: The Philippines competed at the 1992 Summer Paralympics in Barcelona. The Philippines sent a 20-people delegation to the Paralympics and its competitors competed at least in Athletics and Swimming. == Athletics == The Philippines sent competitors in athletics. {|class=wikitable style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Events !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |- !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |rowspan=4|Alejandro Valles |100m |colspan=4 align=center|? |colspan=2 align=center|Did not advance |- |400m |colspan=6 rowspan=3 align=center|Unknown (Non-podium result) |- |1500m |- |4 × 100 m relay |- |colspan=8 align=center|No information for other competitors |} ==See also== * Philippines at the 1992 Summer Olympics ==References== Category:Nations at the 1992 Summer Paralympics 1992 Category:1992 in Philippine sport
title: Philippines at the 1992 Summer Paralympics
